channel.title: ERROR! help................................................................<|>
channel.description:
when i try to log on it says connection loss, my welcome massage dont even come up. [img]http://img225.imageshack.us/img225/8071/errorhe8.png[/img]
this is my client. [img]http://img201.imageshack.us/img201/8969/error2dp7.png[/img]
btw, this is testscape.[br][size=1]Posted at: August 23, 2006, 09:58:15 AM[/size][hr]how do i fix???[br][size=1]Posted at: August 23, 2006, 10:01:02 AM[/size][hr]hmm and i just added some prices to phats and added a bow sword is that the problem?[br][size=1]Posted at: August 23, 2006, 10:05:57 AM[/size][hr][glow=blue,2,300]anyone know??[/glow][br][size=1]Posted at: August 23, 2006, 10:08:06 AM[/size][hr]FIXED!!! Deleted the bow-sword...[br][size=1]Posted at: August 23, 2006, 10:12:48 AM[/size][hr]now this happens ... but it wont log on and it wont log out and i can talk.
[img]http://img225.imageshack.us/img225/9184/error3ic9.png[/img]
